Package hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.reactive

This package contains the Observables main utility class for the reactive programming side of the library, accompanied by some helper classes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CloseableObserver<T>
    A simple helper interface for a closable and observable instance.
    GroupedObservable<Key,Value>
    An observable which provides a key as its group identity.
    Observable<T>
    Defines a provider for a push based value streaming.
    Observer<T>
    The observer who receives the notifications of T.
    RunnableClosableObserver<T>
    A combinational interface for a runnable, closable and an observer, i.e.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultObservable<T>
    An observable + observer implementation which keeps track of the registered observers and common methods which dispach events to all registered observers.
    DefaultObserver<T>
    A wrapper implementation for observer which is able to unregister from the Observable.
    DefaultRunnable
    The runnable instance which is aware of its scheduler's registration.
    DefaultRunnableObserver<T>
    A composite scheduler and observer class for cases when the observation is entangled with some timed schedule operation and they need to communicate with each other and deregister together.
    Reactive
    Utility class to manage observable interfaces.
    RunOnce
    Helper class which ensures that only a single action is invoked.
    TimeInterval<T>
    An immutable record holding a value and a time interval value.
    Timestamped<T>
    An immutable record holding a value and timestamp pairs.

Package hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.reactive Description

This package contains the Observables main utility class for the reactive programming side of the library, accompanied by some helper classes.
